Mason ACM

Mason ACM is part of an international organization, ACM. ACM is an organization for computing professionals to deliver resources that advance computing as a science and a profession.

Our Meetings

Mason ACM meets in Mr. Kummer's room (B109) on Tuesdays and Thursdays, starting at 2:20pm.

Teams

Events

The events team plans and runs all events for Mason ACM. These include the annual LAN party, hour of code, robotics workshops, and more.

Learn More

Tutoring

The tutoring team consists of students from advanced programming backgrounds and courses. Students from this team are present in open labs and help any students requiring assistance.

Learn More

Marketing & Outreach

The marketing & outreach team promotes events, contacts businesses, and promotes Mason ACM as a whole.

Learn More

Business

The business teams are teams consisting of a project manager, a front-end team, and when needed, a back-end team. They are dynamically created for local businesses that need project help. They pair experienced students with learners to faciliate student growth.

Learn More
